oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kitāb-i Ṭūṭīʹnāmah : manuscript, 1778
Ṭūṭīʹnāmah
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nakhshabī, Z̤iyāʼ al-Dīn , -1350
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to the colophon (f. 233r), copy completed in Jumadá al-Thānī 1192 AH [May 1778 AD] in the hand of Kāshī Sallam (?).
Illuminated double title page. Blue painted borders to leaves, with 77 miniatures in color.
Written in fair nastaʻlīq in black ink, 13 lines per page, framed within double red and golden lines.
Rebound in a rebacked leather casing of native workmanship, but with the loss of all fly leaves and marks of ownership.
MS Persian 24. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Persian literature
Tales--Iran
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: طوطى نامه
كتاب طوطى نامه : مخطوطة، 1778
